name: North Sea Core
description: Highest identity volume, strongest contractor overlap, maximum ISPS pressure, proven mandate dynamics.

name: Iberian Gateway
description: Southern EU gateway, container + RoRo + ferry, strong national port authority leverage, border and smuggling dynamics.

name: Italian Security
description: Fragmented operators, centralized mandates, strong anti-mafia and security framing.

name: French State Led
description: Strong state governance, customs authority dominance, ports treated as national infrastructure.

name: German North
description: Federal compliance logic, strong works councils, adoption once consensus is reached.

name: UK Border RoRo
description: Post-Brexit border enforcement, RoRo + container mix, centralized Border Force leverage.

name: Nordic Baltic Gateway
description: High digital maturity, Baltic gateway role, cross-border trucking and ferry flows.

name: Nordic Energy Offshore
description: Energy security, offshore contractor rotation, national-security framing.

name: Eastern EU Security
description: EU/NATO security pressure, modernization funding, weak incumbent identity systems.

name: Adriatic EastMed Gateway
description: RoRo + truck-heavy Balkan gateway, fragmented governance but converging customs logic.

name: Western Med Energy Industrial
description: Petrochemical & LNG concentration, extreme contractor churn, insurance/safety-driven mandates.

name: Rhine Intermodal Security
description: Chemical corridor, dangerous goods, cross-border contractor reuse, customs-driven identity needs.

name: Eastern Med LNG Security
description: EU energy security, LNG infrastructure, defense relevance.

name: Central Med Transshipment
description: High crew turnover, security scrutiny, lower truck identity volume.
